eventCode: string (defined by whoever created the event content, must be unique)
eventPicture: UnityEngine.Sprite (if null or not found, use default picture)

eventChoices.choicePicture: UnityEngine.Sprite (if null or not found, use default picture)

nextChainEventCode: string (defined by whoever created the event content, must be unique, if null or empty, no chain event will be triggered)
